text: March 21, 2018 / 11:56 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Obsidian Energy ‍Comments On FrontFour Capital's Intention To Nominate Board Candidates Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 21 (Reuters) - Obsidian Energy Ltd: * OBSIDIAN ENERGY - ‍COMMENTS ON FRONTFOUR CAPITAL GROUP INTENTION TO NOMINATE FOUR CANDIDATES TO STAND FOR ELECTION AT CO’S 2018 ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING​ * ‍SHAREHOLDERS DO NOT NEED TO TAKE ANY ACTION AT THIS TIME REGARDING VOTING AT ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +1 646 223 8780)
